Triggering Condition: Direct sun glare into forward-facing camera at low sun angle (sunrise/sunset)
Functional Insufficiency: Camera image saturation causing loss of object detection in overexposed region; DNN classifier confidence drops below detection threshold
Hazardous Behavior: Forward Perception System fails to detect preceding braking vehicle; no brake command issued (violates SG-01)
Scenario: Highway driving eastbound at sunrise; preceding vehicle decelerates from 120 km/h to 40 km/h; camera is primary detection sensor in affected region
Risk Reduction Strategy: Multi-sensor fusion: require LiDAR or radar confirmation before suppressing camera-only detections; auto-exposure HDR mode; sun position predictor using GPS time and ephemeris data to pre-weight non-camera sensors
Verification Method: Scenario-based testing with sun glare injection in SiL/HiL; open-road testing during sunrise/sunset corridors; field data collection of edge cases per ISO 21448 Clause 10
Residual Risk: Low — residual risk limited to simultaneous camera and LiDAR degradation during extreme weather

Triggering Condition: Heavy rain (>50 mm/h) causing LiDAR beam scattering and reduced point cloud density
Functional Insufficiency: LiDAR effective range reduced from 200 m to <80 m; point cloud density insufficient for reliable object classification beyond 60 m
Hazardous Behavior: Forward Perception System detection range degrades below minimum required for safe stopping distance at highway speed (violates SG-01)
Scenario: Highway driving at 130 km/h in heavy rainstorm; required detection range for safe stop is 150 m; LiDAR returns insufficient points on vehicles beyond 80 m
Risk Reduction Strategy: Dynamic speed adaptation based on sensor-reported effective range; radar-primary mode activation when LiDAR confidence metric falls below threshold; operational design domain (ODD) restriction to reduce speed or request driver takeover in degraded conditions
Verification Method: Rain chamber testing at calibrated precipitation rates; Monte Carlo simulation of point cloud degradation; fleet data analytics for LiDAR performance vs. precipitation intensity per ISO 21448 Clause 11
Residual Risk: Medium — residual risk for sudden onset heavy rain before speed adaptation completes
